code2.title: Variables & Conditions
code2.code:
nomen = "Noema"
si nomen == "Noema":
    sonus.dic("Optime!")
alio:

x = 10
y = 5
summa = x + y
differentia = x - y
sonus.dic(summa)

items.title: Fibonacci
items.code:
munus fibonacci(n):
    si n <= 1:
        redit n
    alio:
        redit fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)

items.title: Loops
items.code:
pro i in 1..10:
    si i % 2 == 0:
        sonus.dic(i)
    alio:
        sonus.dic("Impar")

items.title: Lists
items.code:
numeri = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
summa = 0
pro n in numeri:
    summa = summa + n
sonus.dic(summa)
